title: Adele Confirms New Album for 2025 — Her First Since '30'
shortdescription: Adele teases '33' — her most personal album yet, recorded in Los Angeles and London.
author: Sophie Laurent

content.content: In a surprise Instagram Live from her London home, Adele confirmed what fans have been praying for: new music is coming in 2025. The as-yet-untitled project (widely rumored to be called ’33’) will be her first album since the record-breaking ’30’ in 2021.

Adele revealed the album was written between Los Angeles and London, describing it as “my most grown-up record yet.” Collaborators include Greg Kurstin, Max Martin, and for the first time — Inflo (known for his work with Little Simz and SAULT).
She teased: “If ’30’ was about divorce, this one is about what comes after. The rebuilding. The joy. The absolute chaos of falling in love when you thought you never would again.”
Lead single expected early Q1 2025, with a full world tour to follow — her first since 2017.
